```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(comment = NA, paged.print=FALSE)
build_nocode(params) 
pulse <- read_pulse()
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
navigate_slots(params)
``` 

## Single condition

```{r}
filter(pulse, age == 22 ) 
```

## Multiple conditions 

```{r}
filter(pulse, age <= 20 & exercise == "moderate") 
```

## Condition on multiple values

```{r}
filter(pulse, exercise == "high" |  exercise =="moderate") 
```
